long_description: The Planet Bike 16g Threadless CO2 Cartridge offers full inflation for any type of tire. Approximately inflates a 29 in. mountain bike tire up to 30 psi (2.0 BAR), a 26 in. mountain bike tire up to 40 psi (2.8 BAR), a 700c road tire to 120 psi (8.3 BAR). Approximately inflates a 700c touring tire to 88 psi (6.0 BAR) and a 700c cyclocross tire to 55 psi (3.8 BAR). The Planet Bike 16g Threadless CO2 Cartridge is compatible Planet Bike Airship CO2 inflator, sold separately.
short_description: The Planet Bike 16g Threadless CO2 Cartridge offers full inflation for any type of tire.
